title: Veggie Lee Restaurant
description: Asian cuisine restaurant opened in early-2015 across from Chabot College. Extensive menu with dishes like vege chicken salad with peanuts or with sweet and sour sauce, chao style fried rice, pan fried noodle with tofu and curry sauce, vege beef with black pepper sauce over chow fun. Uses lots of different mock meats. Reported menu is now all vegan as of Jan 2016.
